original_text: Bezalel made the ark of acacia wood. Two cubits and a half was its length, a cubit and a half its breadth, and a cubit and a half its height.
korean_text: 브살렐이 조각목으로 궤를 만들었으니 길이가 두 규빗 반, 너비가 한 규빗 반, 높이가 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: Bezalel made the ark of acacia wood.
Two cubits and a half was its length,
a cubit and a half its breadth,
and a cubit and a half its height.
